name: calf's feet
ingredients: One calf's foot cut into pieces (Hargma)
250 grams of chickpeas soaked in water overnight
Bunch of parsley and coriander (unspecified quantity)
Spices: Salt, Pepper, Hot chili (optional), Paprika, Cumin, Turmeric, Ginger, Cinnamon
steps: In a pot or pressure cooker, place the pieces of calf's feet. Add the olive oil, onions, grated garlic, the bunch of parsley/coriander, and all the spices.
Add the drained chickpeas and raisins (if used). Cover with water.

Cook in the pressure cooker (about 1 to 1.5 hours after it starts whistling) or on low heat in a pot/tajine for several hours (at least 2 to 3 hours) until the meat is very tender and falls off the bone, and the sauce is thick and reduced.
